name: Richard Simpson
bio: Ex CEO of Launchpool.xyz and senior team member Alphabit. Delivered over $20m of capital formation for 40 web3 and crypto projects across DeFi, gaming, fashion, metaverse & infrastructure.

name: Dom Rodwell
bio: Brought multiple tech platforms to market across mobile, web and web3 reaching billions of users. Deep experience as CEO & CPO building and scaling teams and projects.

name: Rebecca Short
bio: Ex-agency director and former head of product and delivery at a tech incubator. 4 years experience working with tech founders to scale their product and business.

name: Ahmad Pouladzadeh
bio: Software architect with 8 years working in web3 including identity, gaming, DeFi & building exchanges. Strong builder and leader of technical teams.
